package.name: pumpkin_support

description.p: OSU AIMS Lab - Robotic Pumpkin Carving Tooling
This package contains configuration data and CAD files for the physical environment in the AIMS Lab @ Ohio State. Facility: 1314 Kinnear Rd. Columbus, OH 43212

Before using any of the configuration files and / or meshes included in this package, be sure to check they are correct for the particular robot model(s) and configuration you intend to use them with.

package.author: A.C. Buynak
package.maintainer: A.C. Buynak (AIMS Lab @ The Ohio State University)
